plot: A young woman and a dancer are glued by the love of the same man, while the obligations of tradition set against the ardent sensuality of love, set them apart.
title: Sounds of Oud
plot_es: A young woman and a dancer are glued by the love of the same man, while the obligations of tradition set against the ardent sensuality of love, set them apart.
plot_en: A young woman and a dancer are glued by the love of the same man, while the obligations of tradition set against the ardent sensuality of love, set them apart.
